1121.content:
You've selected the Martin Family, an average middle class family.

First there's Frank Martin, the father, an out of shape accountant in his late 30's. Currently he is 6'1" at a flabby 230 lbs.
Second there's Lisa Martin, the mother, a short secretary. Currently she is 5'4" at 109 lbs.
Third is the eldest son, Dean, an 17 year old teenager. Currently he is 5'10" at 154 lbs. lean..
Finally is Cindy, the youngest. She is 15 years old. Currently she is 5'2" at 98 lbs.

It's family game night, and the Martins have recently purchased a new board game. Lisa had bought it from a strange shop as she was coming home from work, thinking that it would bring them together. Little did she know was that this little innocent board game had incredible powers, something they would all find out soon. It took awhile for her to convince the ever busy family to sit down and play, but finally they all took a seat around the four sides of the board.

"Isn't this nice?" She said as he got comfortable on the carpet. "We've haven't done something together as a family in ages."

"Mom, do we really have to do this?" Dean asked.

"Yea, I was waiting for a very important call." Cindy said. "Joanne asked Scott to the dance, but he hasn't replied yet."

"You're dreaming, Scott only dates tall girls." Dean laughed.

"And Julie Foster only goes out with guys over six feet tall."

"Hey, I'm still growing!"

"Yea, growing dumber!"

"Hey, that's enough you two!" Frank interupted their arguement. "Your mother went through the trouble of buying us this new game for us to play." Frank said. "The least you can do is play for an hour or two. THEN you can go back to whatever you want to do."

The two of them gave each other a spiteful glare, but stopped arguing.

"Okay, let's start." Lisa said, putting up a cheerful smile as she places the four small metal characters on the starting position. "I guess I'll go first." She took the dice and rolled out a three. She reached out to move her piece, but to their surprise the piece (which was oddly resembled her for some reason they just noticed) moved on it's own, sliding across the board until it landed on a...

11212.content:
To their surprise the piece (which was oddly resembled her for some reason they just noticed) moved on it's own, sliding across the board until it landed on a blue square.

"Dude, what was that!?" Dean said.

"It moved by itself!" Cindy said.

"Calm down, it's probably just magnets or something." Frank said, though it felt more like he was trying to explain it more for himself than for his kids. "It's like one of those high tech games they have nowadays. Now then honey, I think you're suppose to pick up one of those blue cards over there?"

Lisa regained her wits and nodded, taking the top blue card from the board. As she read it, she frowned.

"What does it say?" Frank asked.

She looked up, confused. "It just says 'gain half a foot in height.'"

As soon as the words escaped her lips, the card suddenly flashed. Lisa dropped the card in surprise and then something impossible happened. Before their eyes, they watched Lisa suddenly grow taller! Her legs stretched out away from her, and her body lengthened, causing her head to rise higher and higher, until finally she was 6 feet tall, even. Her clothes hugged her body tightly and awkwardly, having been made for a woman much shorter than she was currently. The bottom of her blouse was now too short, exposing some of her stomach, and the end of her jeans came up to her ankles.

"Oh my god!"

"What the fuck!?"

"Dean, Cindy, you two watch your language!" Lisa snapped at her kids, breaking her out of her surprise momentarily.

"Mom, you freakin' grew half a foot!" Dean said. "Who cares about cussing now!"

"Do you think the game did this?" Cindy asked.

"No shit, idiot!" Dean said.

"Hey, you don't have to be mean about it!"

"QUIET!" Frank bellowed, silencing them. "Lisa, where did you get this game?"

"In a shop that i found when I took a wrong turn today." Lisa said. "I thought it was odd because I know that part of town very well, and yet I didn't recognize the street at all...this all seems like one big dream." She tried to get up and almost lost her balance before she got used to her new height. "Everything looks so...different."

Dean looked at the board game. "If one roll made mom grow to six feet tall, what happens if we play through?"

"No, it could be dangerous." Frank said, taking the die before his son could grab it.

"Dad, come on, give it to me!" Dean said, trying to take it and accidentally knocked it out of Frank's hand in the process. As they watched, the die rolled out a five and Frank's piece moved across the board until it landed on a...

113.title: High School teens

1131.content:
Ian - 14, short blonde hair and tan skin, athletic, 5' 7" 135 lbs.
Julian - 15, spiky black hair, light-skinned Latino, thick but not fat, 5' 11", 160 lbs.
Adam - 14, shaggy brown hair, fair skin, skinny, 5' 5" 120 lbs.

The three boys, friends since the first day of high school, had gathered in Adam's basement, where he had pulled out a board game from the attic.

"What is it?" Julian asked. "It looks kinda old."

"I've never seen anything like it before!" Ian said, marveling over the wood carving in the box.

"I don't know what it is," Adam shrugged. "I just sorta found it one day and thought it would be fun to try out."

"'Transmorpha'" Ian read. "That's an interesting name for a game."

"Well, I'll try anything once," Julian said. "Let's set it up!"

It only took a few minutes to open up the board, which was built in to the box so that when the box folded open the playing board was elevated. Two decks of identical-looking cards were situated in grooves in the center of the board. Each boy picked out a playing piece, different colored wooden pyramid-shaped blocks, from a drawer carved into the wood and fit it into the groove. Ian was the yellow piece, Julian was the red piece, and Adam was the Black piece.

"There's no instructions or anything," Adam frowned slightly. "Oh well, I'm sure we'll figure it out as we go." "

"Who goes first?" Ian asked.

"Let's roll to see!" Julian suggested.

They did so, and Ian won the roll. He then rolled again to start, getting a four and landing on a red square. "What do I do now?"

Adam shrugged. "I dunno. Draw a card, I guess."

Ian did so, turning it over for everyone to see.

"It's blank." Julian pointed out.

"That's weird," Adam said. "Maybe it's just a throw-away card or something."

"No, wait!" Ian said. "It's changing! Look!"

Right before their eyes, a red square appeared in the middle of the white card. Above the square, in script writing, appeared the word "Height." Below it appeared an image of a pair of dice.

"Whoa, that's pretty awesome!" Julian said. "It just appeared out of nothing!"

"I wonder if it's a hologram," Ian suggested.

"I think it wants you to roll the dice," Adam said.

Ian did so, landing a seven. As the dice came to a stop, the number seven then appeared, filling up the card, then disappeared. In its place appeared: "You will grow seven feet taller."

"Huh?" Ian asked, frowning. "What does that m--"

He stopped as he felt his clothes begin to get tighter, and then start to rip. His body started to expand, his legs getting longer where he sat and his torso stretching upward. He scooted away from the board, not wanting to hit it with his feet which were beginning to rip through his socks. His face looked scared but also excited about what was happening.

"No way!" Julian exclaimed. "It's really happening! You're growing!"

Ian didn't say anything as his clothes ripped and fell off, landing in scraps below him. The only thing that stayed on was his boxers, and by the time he had finished growing, over 12 feet tall, they seemed like they wouldn't last too much longer, and would be shredded if he tried to stand up.

"I'm a freakin' giant!" Ian cried out, his voice much louder than normal.

"This game is amazing!" Julian's face was full of anticipation. "My turn next!" He rolled the dice, getting a three, and moved his piece, landing on a ...

11312.content:
After landing on the green square, Julian said aloud, "Hm, Green. Wonder what that would mean."

"Well, only one way to find out," Adam said, motioning to the stack of cards and jabbing his elbow into Julian's side in fun.

"OWW!" Julian cried playfully. "Stop that!" He stuck out his tongue at Adam and started to jump at his friend to tackle him, but was stopped by Ian's large hand.

"Would you just pick up the card?" Ian impatiently asked. "I want it to be my turn again!"

"Fine, fine," Julian chuckled. "Take it easy there, big guy." He reached over and picked the next card off of the stack, turning it over. It, too was blank, and the three boys waited to see what would appear on it. After a moment, the word "Muscle" in big, bold letters faded into view.

"All right!" Julian pumped his fist in the air. "I get to bulk up!"

Below the word, a picture of a spinner appeared. "Wait, it says you need to spin now?" Ian asked, scratching his head. "I'm confused. What spinner?"

"Maybe that spinner?" Adam said, pointing to the middle of the board. Sure enough, a brightly-painted wooden spin wheel was now there.

"Whoa," Ian's eyes went even bigger than they already were. "I could've sworn that wasn't there a second ago."

"Who cares?" Julian exclaimed. "I want to get some MUSCLE!"

He took the spinner by the center and got ready. It was a very large spinner, having room for numbers from 1-100. Taking a deep breath, he let it loose. It seemed to spin forever, finally slowing down and coming to a stop.

"72!" Adam cried out. "Boy, I bet that's good!"

Sure enough, bold text appeared on the bottom half of the card: "You will grow 72 pounds of muscle!"

Julian jumped to his feet, getting in position. "Here it comes! I can feel it!"

His muscles had started to pulsate, visible through his shirt to the other boys, who watched in wonder. They began to push outward, swelling bigger and bigger. Julian's wide frame got even wider, as pound after pound of muscle appeared on his chest and arms, pushing his shoulders apart. He looked at both biceps as they increased in size, and his shirt began to tighten, his enlarging muscles forcing the fabric to split apart.

"Oh, yeah," Julian moaned in pleasure. "That's it! Ah, I feel so GREAT!"

While his legs didn't get as much benefit as his torso, they certainly still had gotten bigger. His jeans were now nearly skin-tight, revealing a firm bubble-butt, and in the front a noticeable bulge seemed to be yearning to break free. As the final stages of growth hit, his shirt finally tore completely open down the middle and his sleeves tore. Julian kept the ripped shirt on like a vest, liking how it framed his large pecs and rippled abs.

Adam couldn't help but lean closer to Julian and place his hand, feeling the warmth and firmness of his chest. Julian didn't mind, in fact causing his pectoral muscle to flex under Adam's touch, causing the still-small boy to jump a little in fright.

"What do you think?" Julian asked his friends.

"It's okay," Ian said with a grin. "I still like mine better."

"I think," Adam said, "That it's my turn!" He picked up the dice and started to roll them, excited to begin his turn and see what the game had in store for him.

Welcome to Giants and Magic, a fantastic journey that will take you into the big wide world! The words flashed on the screen. To get you used to the game, select one of the magic spells below for a test run!

Without even looking Josh clicked a random line and hit enter, not really paying attention to what he was doing.

The spell has now been cast, and will take a day to take effect! Until then, have fun! Then the screen went blank, and the CD popped out.

"What the hell?" Josh said. He rebooted the computer and he tried to put the CD back into his computer, but his computer kept on ejecting it. "This thing is junk!" He said as he tossed it into his waste bin. Feeling like he wasted enough time, he decided to go to just call it a day and sleep. The next day...

Not worried about it he got up out of bed and started to head to his bedroom door but he had to squat down to get through the door. Josh thought to himself what the game said about testing out one of the magic spells. He remembered that he clicked on the all men grow a foot taller but didn't think it would actually happen. 12231122.content:
"Josh! Breakfast is ready!" Josh's mom called up to him.

"I'm coming!" Josh replied as he pulled on his shirt and went downstairs into the kitchen. There his little brother Keith and little sister Megan were already eating their food and their mother placed a third plate in front of Josh as he sat down.

"Good morning sweetie, excited about your first day at school as a 17 year old?" His mom asked.

"It's just another day of school mom." Josh said as he picked up his fork to start eating, but when he looked at his mom he frowned. For some reason she looked…different somehow. Maybe it was the way she did her hair or something, but there was something off that Josh couldn’t quite get.

"Is there something wrong?" His mom asked when she noticed him staring.

“No, it’s nothing.” He shook his head and continued to eat. He was probably just imagining things or something. Josh was still a bit upset that his mom got him a crappy game that didn’t even work.

“Hey mom, can we go shopping after school?” Megan asked. “I need some new clothes.”

“But you just got new clothes two weeks ago.” Their mom said.

“But they don’t fit right anymore.” She complained.

“That’s why I told you to buy something a bit roomier.” Their mom sighed.

“Ah don’t bother mom, she’s just getting fat.” Keith snickered.

“I am NOT getting fat!” Megan glared at Keith.

“Okay, enough fighting you two.” Their mom said. “Hurry up and finish breakfast, your bus should be here soon.”

Megan shot Keith another dark glare, but the two of them resumed eating. Now that she mentioned it, Megan’s clothes DID look like it didn’t fit quite right to Josh. He shrugged it off to some shrinkage in the wash, and it was her fault for buying clothes too small in the first place like mom said.

In a few minutes Josh finished eating breakfast, got his bag and went to the bus stop, ready for another average day of school. Little did he know that the day was going to be anything BUT average….average height that is.

123.content:
"It's here! It's finally here!" Sam whooped with delight as he ran up the stairs, clutching an envelope that had come in today's mail.

"Really?" Alex poked his head out, knowing exactly what his younger brother was so excited for, as he had been anticipating its delivery for weeks since they clipped the form out of the back of one of their video game magazines and mailed in the order for this awesome-sounding (but obscure) PC Game: "Total Domination". It promised a completely immersive experience like none other with ultimate control over your character, and it only cost five bucks plus shipping, so it seemed like an easy decision.

Alex and Sam both rushed to the PC together, the thirteen year old Sam reaching the desk chair first, while the fifteen-year-old Alex leaned on the back of the chair, watching as Sam put the disk in the drive. Within seconds, the installer came up, and although it only took less than three minutes to install the game, it seemed to be an eternity to the excited boys.

"What are you going to do first?" Sam asked as they waited.

"I don't know," Alex thought. "Maybe try to see how crazy they let us make the character, push the limits of it, ya know?"

"Yeah!" Sam nodded. "Or just go into the nearest town and see how much we can blow up or somethin'!"

DING! The Installer finished, and Sam quickly cleared the window and opened the program. The screen went black for a second, and then came up to a title screen. The words "Total Domination" appeared in big, blocky, almost-pixelated letters. "Uh oh," Alex wondered aloud, "I hope the graphics in the game are better than this."

"It's just a title screen, come on!" Sam said, trying to smile brightly, although the same worry was nagging at the back of his head.

After a few moments, the words "Press Enter" appeared below the title, and, taking a deep breath, Sam hit the enter key. When he did...

141.content:
Chaad was always the big man on campus. Always. Since he was five he outgrew and outshined all he peers at everything they did. He had been on countless sports teams, and had the looks of a model. With short blond hair and deep blue eyes, all the girls in the school whent gaga over him. There was only one problem.

Chad didn't like people. Period. Some considered him asexual, others considered him an egotistical asshole. This is whst lead Chad to want to dominate others. He wanted to be the best, better than any man on Earth. He was 16 years old, but already had the phisique of an NFL quarter back. He worked out constantly, all a part of his endless quest to be the best.

So when he heard about the new reality series "Growing Pains" and that it was looking for competitors, of course he signed up! He got little information on it. All he knew was-

1. There would be ten competetors, all male, ages 16-18
2. Everyday the contestants would partake in an intense physical challenge
3. The winning team got to experience some "growing pains", which sounded to Chad like an awful prize, while the losers voted a member off of their team.
4. Each team would consistt of five boys.

Chad didn't care about prizes or fame. The opportunity to beat 18 year olds was entising to him, so he signed up.

He was the first picked to be on the show.

The producers payed to have him fly down to the Carribean, where the show was to be filmed, and meet the other nine boys there.

Marshal, African American, 17 years old, 6'0'', athletic build,
Tom, Caucasian, 16 years old, 5'9'', slim build,
Allan, Asian, 18 years old, 5'10'', normal build,
James, Caucasian, 16 years old, 6'2'', very athelic build, bound to be Chad's competition,
Jessie, Caucasian, 18 years old, 6'0'', portly build,
Andre, African American, 18 years old, 6'1'', lean build,
Sean, Asian, 17 years old, 5'1'', slim build,
Britt, Mexican American, 5'10'', slim build
West, Caucasian, 6'1'', Athletic build

By the look of the competition, Chad figured that there were only about three people who were true competition. He would have to watch James, for he was a threat.

And Chad hated threats to his winning percentage.

The host of the show was a newbie to the world of reality game shows who went by the name of Alex Newman. He had slicked back black hair, fair skin, and a nice face. He always wore sunglasses and was overly cheerfull, like thete was a double meaning to every word he spoke.

"Alright contestants! Welcome! We will split you off into teams, then the teams will go to their lodgings to rest up for our first challenge, which begins tomorrow at eight sharp. Team one will consist of Chad, Tom, Jessie, Andre, and West. The rest of you will form team two. Now rest up, because you all have a big day tomorrow!"

Chad wasn't too worried about his team. West would be his best support, but he'd have to get Jessie on an excercise program, pronto, or else he would be a hinderance. Worst of all, he had to make friends...no, he wouldn't call them that. Allies. Allies is the better word here.

But there was no telling what would be in store on a game who's motto was "The tables can be turned at any moment. Just wait."
141.title: A high school jock

144.content:
Howard stomped back into his dorm room. He’d spent over an hour at the post office in order to sign for some certified letter he wasn’t even expecting. He’d never had to sign for a letter before. He tore open the envelope to find out what wasted an hour of his day.

Dear Mr. Schwartz, We are pleased to inform you that you’ve been selected to compete on the new season of Big Man on Campus.

Howard’s heart skipped a beat. Big Man on Campus! His favorite (and only) reality show he watched!

A bunch of nerdy guys live together in a house, compete in games and get voted off one at a time (just like Big Brother). The only difference is The Machine. It can make whoever stepped out of it taller, with less fat and more muscle than when they went in. No one knows how it works and the show’s producers won’t say, but it’s definitely real.

As long as contestants stayed on the show, they got to keep growing bigger, until at the end only one huge muscle stud remained. And along with a new body, the winner also got a million dollar prize.

It only lasted a few weeks, but Howard watched every episode religiously. For as long as he could remember he’d wished he were taller and better built. And when he found about open auditions for the next season he practically fell over himself to send in a tape.

We feel you’re an ideal candidate for our show

He knew what that meant. 5’6” and 125 lbs. soaking wet, Howard was the prototypical skinny nerd the show catered to. They even asked him to wear his glasses on the show rather than contacts.

The guy who won started out short and scrawny like him, and by the end had grown into a 6’9” well muscled athlete who just the other day was named to the NBA All-Star team.

He signed the all the attached paperwork and started packing for his trip to LA.

…

Howard took his place on the darkened stage. Each contestant was led into their own little spotlight by a scantily-clad swimsuit model surrounded by half a dozen cameras. And they each had to stand there in nothing but boxer shorts.

Howard looked over to the other contestant who would soon be introduced and tried to size up the competition.

Dan stood 5’11”, but weighed an immense 375 pounds of fat. He could’ve just as easily been on The Biggest Loser instead. He looked the least happy about standing around in his skivvies.

Jason also looked rather meek and embarrassed, but to Howard he looked like trouble. Even though he was nothing but skin and bones, Jason was 6’5” tall. With that height he could divert more of his growth to his muscles and outshine all the others.

Hank was almost the same size as Dan, but looked like he might have some muscle mass underneath the fat.

All in all they were a varied group physically, but still a typical group of nerds.

The fifth contestant, however, didn’t fit the norm.

His name was Craig. He was 6’1” and at least 200 lbs. of lean muscle; the typical football jock. He was already as big as many of last year’s contestants were half-way though the competition. And unlike the others, he wasn’t the least bit self conscious about being on TV in his underwear; he tried to look inconspicuous about flexing his arms and 6-pack abs for the camera.

It looks like the producers wanted to add some extra antagonism for the new season. Even if he didn’t win, he was probably going to make things miserable while he was here.

“Gentlemen, welcome to the all new season of Big Man on Campus!”

A spotlight lit up in the center of the stage revealing Tom Manning, the show’s mostly tolerable host.

“This... is The Machine!”

Another light revealed the real star of the show. It looked like a death ray from an old Sci-Fi movie with lots of tubes and flashing lights. Howard assumed that was all for show, but he didn’t care as long as it worked.

“The Machine can give you the body you always wanted, but only for a price.”

Tom dramatically held up a large brass coin with a plus sign on it.

“This... is a growth token. Each token will grant you one of the following:

An inch in height
5 pounds of muscle gain
10 pounds of fat loss

And new for this season, growth tokens can also be used to grant you ½ inch of growth... down there.”

The models all tittered, as they’d obviously been prompted to do. Howard heard they were going to “spice things up” this season and add an uncensored online feed of what went on in the house at night, but he never imagined that was going to entail everyone’s dicks growing bigger.

You may notice a few other changes this year. The next Big Man on Campus could be... a woman!

Even more spotlights popped on and similarly under-clothed male models led out another group of five contestants- all girls!

Claire was positively tiny. 4’10” tall and likely not even 100 pounds. She seemed happy and excited to be here despite the circumstances.

Alyssa was also very slight of frame, but unlike Claire stood a fantastic 6’3”. Just like Jason, she could be trouble.

Rachel and Denise were actually sisters. They were both about the same 5’7” in height and both pretty heavy. They didn’t look too formidable, but if they worked together, could prove a challenge.

At the end of the line stood Misty. She was clearly meant to be Craig’s female counterpart. 5’10”, blonde, tanned & toned with big D-Cup breasts, she had the stuck up cheerleader look down to an art.

“Ladies, we made special adjustments to The Machine just for you. On top of the height, fat and muscle options the guys have, female contestants can also use their tokens to make 1 inch adjustments to their hips, waist or bust to sculpt the ultimate bikini bod.”

The models dispersed amongst the contestants, giving each one a bag that hung around their neck. Howard pulled open the drawstrings on his and peered inside. Glinting from the bottom of the bag were two growth tokens.

“For the first week, you each get two growth tokens to use however you please at any time. Each week, the remaining contestants will get more and more growth tokens. Four next week; six the week after that, all the way to the final week where the two remaining competitors will each get 20 tokens.”

Howard’s mind reeled as he did the math in his head. Adding up the number of tokens one got each week, the two that made it to the final week each would get 110 tokens, plus whatever else won in the games. Last year’s winner only ended up with about 50 overall. Whoever made it to the end of this was going to be gigantic.

“Throughout the week you’ll all compete in games to test your prowess, both mentally and physically.”

“But this year the winner won’t receive extra tokens, but instead steal tokens from a competitor of their choice.”

“Plus, contestants can also give their tokens to others if they wish to forge alliances and team up against the competition.”

“At the end of each week one contestant will be voted off and no longer have access to The Machine. We keep going until only one remains.”

“Also, in addition to the Million Dollar prize, this year’s winner will also receive... 50 additional growth tokens!”

Fifty more?! Howard thought to himself. He was having trouble even comprehending how big that would make him if he won.

At this point, Tom stopped to introduce each contestant and get a few words from them, Howard was so out of it, he barely said a word for his interview, sputtering out something about “being thrilled to be here.”

Craig, on the other hand, was not at a loss for words.

“Aw man, my life long idol is Arnold Schwarzenegger. Man, when he first won Mr. Olympia he was 6’3” and a huge 235 pounds.“

“And you’d like to give Arnold a run for his money?” Tom followed up.

“Man, when I win, I wanna be so big I make Arnold look like this shrimp here,” he said, motioning toward Howard.

Misty’s interview went about as expected, saying she knew she was already the hottest girl at her school, but wanted to “hotify” herself further so she could become a famous singer.

Once the interviews were over, the lights to reveal the stage they were on was actually the giant living room the the show’s over-sized house.

“The Big Man on Campus house has everything you could ever ask for: a pool, a hot tub, an Olympics-grade weight room to test your growing muscles. Plus our army of designers will be here with new clothes custom tailored to your changing bodies.”

“The only thing we’re short on is bedrooms. Each of you will have to share sleeping space with at least one other contestant.”

Howard, you’ll be rooming with:

154.content:
So, here are the rules of this variant of the Growing Game:
1. The game ends when someone loses or if the pile runs empty
2. If anybody wants to quit for any reason, excluding a unanimous break, their changes are permanent and cannot be changed
2a. If one is able to find a reversal card and does not wish to use it on themselves, it can be used on another player who is either still playing or has quit
3. Once the game ends, it is up to each person to decide if they want to keep their changes or lose them. The changes are permanent if kept.
4. The game starts with all the cards in a pile. There are 124 cards, each one of five variants.
Red: Will make the player go through the equivalent of 1 year of puberty, assuming a linear rate and no limit.
Blue: Will make the player grow up to 1 foot. Amounts vary based on the specific card.
Green: Will cause genital growth, as in Breasts and Butts for females and larger cocks for males. May also increase sensitivity.
Purple: Player choice. The player who drew the card may choose a growth and an amount. The rest of the players decide how much of the amount said player grows. Any growth is possible from Physical, Mental and even Metaphysical. If luck is decided to change this way, it is an exact 50/50 weather it will be good luck or bad luck, luck growths will not change this outcome.
Reversal: Allows the drawer to reset their own changes or another player's. Can work on players that have quit the game.
5. No players are allowed to cheat in any way. If there are house rules, write them down below.
6.______________________
7.______________________
8.______________________
9.______________________
10._____________________

Set-up
Shuffle cards into one pile. One player cuts the deck, then another player cuts it again. The last player goes first. Owner of the game shuffles. Play continues to the clockwise direction, unless specified otherwise in house rules. The only requirements to play are a deck and at least two people. One player takes one card, then the change occurs. If caught cheating, the effect will instead be thrown into reverse and the player will shrink the amount they would've grown. No other people can join a game after one round is complete. Any player may quit before their first turn with no penalty.
Winning
Winning is only possible if you manage to get all thirty of any one card, or all four reversal cards. If one player should succeed in this, they are allowed to draw one more card before the game ends and that change is decided independently of the other changes that may or may not have occurred. If the deck runs out, the player with the most cards of any one kind is considered the winner but may not draw another card.


With the rules in place, the wizard placed his card game down. He planned on putting it up for sale tomorrow as a test run. He grabbed his wand and uttered a few Magic words. When he was finished, another copy of the rules appeared and the original had a deck of cards. He placed them in a case, then went to bed.

Who finds the game in the morning?
154.title: A bit more out there

info.brief_description: Games are always fun, especially when you play with size!
info.description:
Games are always fun, but they're even more fun when you play with size! Height, weight, muscle, fat, body parts; In this game, anything goes!

Rules are that you must try to write more than a few words per chapter. Main focus is growth. Some shrinking or size-theft/drain is okay. Some adult context is okay, but no graphical deaths/toilet/vore. Try and keep the threads going with some good choices, and don't be afraid to add stuff.
